name: Lucky Number 13
description:
[Introduction]

In a laboratory of dark science, beneath the ground floor of a remote structure, a failed experiment known only as “number 13” broke its shackles and set out for revenge.

[What is “Lucky Number 13”?]

A top down action/puzzle shooter made for Ludum Dare 43 in 72 hours. (Link to LD page)

[Theme]

The theme of the game jam was "Sacrifices must be made. One of the main mechanics that the game revolves around is the 3 elemental abilities that the player can acquire. These are used to defeat enemies and solve puzzles. The only way to obtain the [Ice], [Fire] and [Electricity] attacks is by hurting your character. For an example you need to stick your fingers into a power outlet (do not try at home) to get / recharge your electricity attack, but causes you to lose health. 

[Controls]
  • [Arrow keys / [W] [A] [S] [D] - Move character
  • [Left Click] - Shoot / examine / trigger
  • [Escape] - Pause Menu
